name: Contagion (itch) (hootski, GoatHG, VanillaTwilight, TsarGopnik)
description:
This is our team's submission to the Jamming the Curve game jam!

Fight waves of misinformed civilians! Get them masked up!

KeysControlsWASDMoveLeft-ClickShootCSwitch WeaponsRight-ClickZoom
